House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01587
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING AND ENHANCING ROLE OF PARENT-TEACHER AND COMMUNITY ASSOCIATIONS IN PROMOTING THE WELFARE AND PROTECTING THE RIGHTS OF CHILDREN AND THE YOUTH, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 603 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS ꞌTHE CHILD AND YOUTH WELFARE CODEꞌ
ABSTRACT : States that PTCA shall be the forum for the discussion of problems and solutions, issues and concerns relative to the rearing, education and development of children towards civic efficiency, thus insuring the full cooperation of parents, teachers and other community stakeholders in its efficient and effective implementation.
